name: Shortcuts
desc: A widget that creates key bindings to specific actions for its descendants.

fields.name: manager
fields.desc: The [ShortcutManager] that will manage the mapping between key combinations and [Action]s.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The child widget for this [Shortcuts] widget.

fields.name: debugLabel
fields.desc: The debug label that is printed for this node when logged.
